snippet.title: Grim Tranquility Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Earth is dead. The stars await. Wishlist Grim Tranquility at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1697110/Grim_Tranquility/ !

After centuries of environmental exploitation, the Earth is all but destroyed... its resources depleted... its climate uninhabitable. Humankind has used the last available resources to search for a home in a new world that may be harsher than even Earth was.

Grim Tranquility is a brand new sci-fi-themed roguelite, tactics-based RPG where you explore alien worlds and battle vicious enemies in your quest to establish the first human settlement in space. Will humanity finally learn from their past mistakes or are they doomed to repeat the avoidable tragedies of their ancestors?

https://twitter.com/PoorlyTimedGame
https://facebook.com/PoorlyTimedGames
